source.5d8eeb75: **A good letter of recommendation and SOP also assist in getting an admission. **
source.6d3a25ba: **CGPA also have a linear relation with the chance of admission.**
source.ee2ad07a: ## After examing relation between the chance of admission and every other feature it is evident that the chance of admission has a linear relation with every other feature. Hence, the Linear Regression model will be a great choice to predict Admission chance of a student.
source.1bfd0f65: **Chance of getting an admission also change significantly based on university ranking.**
source.2b3b5796: **Hign GRE and TOEFL Score also increase students chance of Admission. A student who gets a good GRE score also tends to get a good TOEFL score. They are almost linearly related.**
